ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.
ygData.msgSnippet: are you guys talking about 2 different songs?  sounds like maybe Anthem is thinking of disenchating melody (22) and Sartori is thinking of anti-magic aria
ygData.messageBody:
are you guys talking about 2 different songs? sounds like maybe Anthem is
thinking of disenchating melody (22) and Sartori is thinking of anti-magic
aria (40)? level 40 works, level 22 does not. i know GZ found the bug, but
i don't know if there has been a patch since then.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
